title: Futari Ecchi For Ladies
alternative_title: ふたりエッチ for Ladies ; ふたりエッチ ゆらさん日誌 ; ふたりエッチ フォア レディース ; Futari Ecchi - Yura's Diary ; Futari Ecchi - Yura-san Nisshi
status: ふたりエッチ for Ladies ; ふたりエッチ ゆらさん日誌 ; ふたりエッチ フォア レディース ; Futari Ecchi - Yura's Diary ; Futari Ecchi - Yura-san Nisshi
description:
Description :
        It is main a story based on the hit manga by Katsu Aki, 'Futari Ecchi" in Yura's point of view. The newlywed story continues but this time around the perspective is from Yura, our FE heroine. This tale adds new twists and mind boggling problems that women encounter.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1 : [Includes Chapters 1-6.  See Forum For Chapter Names.]
